Sensors’ Modules and Methods:¶

battery sensor:¶

class battery_sensor.Battery_sensor¶

A class to handle the Battery sensor.

get_voltage(nb_values)¶

Returns the voltage value

gas sensor:¶

class gas_sensor.GasSensor(i2c_bus, meas_intvl)¶

A class to handle the CO2 and TVOC sensor.

Parameters:
  • i2c_bus – The I2C object to use.
  • meas_intvl – The minimal amount of time between two measurements (in ms).
get_co2()¶

Return last read CO2 concentration (in ppm) or None is last reading failed.

get_tvoc()¶

Return last read TVOC (in ppm) or None is last reading failed.

work(n_try_max)¶

Perform a measurement (every minute, if possible), and save baseline (every hour, if possible).

Parameters:n_try_max – Number of reading tentatives.

gps sensor:¶

class gps_sensor.GPSSensor(uart)¶

A class to handle the GPS.

Parameters:uart – The UART object to use.
get_latitude()¶

Return last read latitude and longitude or None if last reading failed.

get_longitude()¶

Return last read latitude and longitude or None if last reading failed.

get_time()¶

Return last read time or None if last reading failed.

work()¶

Polls the GPS and checks if it has fix to take the measures returns True or False

humidity sensor:¶

class humidity_sensor.TempHumiditySensor(i2c_bus, meas_intvl)¶

A class to handle the temperature and humidity sensor.

Parameters:
  • i2c_bus – The I2C object to use.
  • meas_intvl – The minimal amount of time between two measurements (in ms).
get_humidity()¶

Return last read temperature or None is last reading failed.

get_temperature()¶

Return last read temperature or None is last reading failed.

work(n_try_max)¶

Perform a measurement. :param n_try_max: Number of reading tentative (this sensor does not always respond…)

pm sensor (dust):¶

class pm_sensor.PMSensor(uart, meas_dur)¶

A class to handle the fine particle sensor.

Parameters:
  • uart – The UART object to use.
  • meas_dur – time duration of the FAN before the measure (in ms).
get_pm10()¶

Return last read PM 10µm concentration (in ppm) different from zero, None if last reading failed.

get_pm25()¶

Return last read PM 2.5µm concentration (in ppm) or None if last reading failed.

work()¶

Checks the fan time and last_meas_time. Stops the FAN every meas_dur in miliseconds, then do a measurement. returns True or False

LoRa Air Quality Sensor
